raw_text:
Based on the provided paper content, I'll extract the structured information:

```json
{
  "paper_metadata": {
    "title": "Impact of 'One House One Farm' Approach on Farmers' Livelihood Status in Selected Areas of Mymensingh District",
    "matches_expected_title": "YES"
  },
  "program_information": {
    "program_name": "One House One Farm (Ektee Bari Ektee Khamar)",
    "country": "Bangladesh",
    "region": "Mymensingh district (Bhabkhali, Char Nilakshmia and Char Ishwardia unions)",
    "target_population": "Rural poor farmers"
  },
  "intervention_components": {
    "component_a_cash_support": {
      "component_a_present": false,
      "cash_support_type": null,
      "cash_amount": null,
      "cash_frequency": null,
      "is_loan_or_credit": "NO",
      "cash_evidence_citation": null
    },
    "component_b_assets": {
      "component_b_present": true,
      "assets_provided": ["farming inputs", "agricultural resources"],
      "direct_provision": "YES",
      "assets_evidence_citation": "The project will enable the rural poor and the community people with the physical and financial supports to find for their self-employment opportunities"
    }
  },
  "study_characteristics": {
    "outcomes_measured": [
      "income/earnings",
      "employment",
      "food security/nutrition",
      "human capital",
      "social capital",
      "natural capital",
      "physical capital",
      "financial capital"
    ],
    "outcomes_evidence_citation": "The access on human capital, social capital, natural capital, physical capital and financial capital for project farmers were increased by 29.5%, 25.7%, 9.0%, 18.3% and 22.3%, respectively | Daily per capita calorie intake from different food items was higher for project farmers than the non-project farmers",
    "study_design": "Quasi-experimental",
    "design_evidence_citation": "Data were analyzed with a combination of descriptive statistics and econometric analyses like logistic regression and propensity score matching methods",
    "is_review_or_policy_analysis": false,
    "publication_year": null,
    "study_conducted_year": null,
    "sample_size": 90,
    "completed": true
  },
  "bonus_information": {
    "has_qualitative_components": false,
    "qualitative_methods": [],
    "qualitative_evidence_citation": null,
    "has_cost_data": true,
    "cost_mentions": "Project worth Tk. 5.927 billion",
    "cost_evidence_citation": "The duration of the project is seven years starting from July, 2009 to June, 2016 worth of Tk. 5.927 billion"
  },
  "evidence_citations": {
    "program_name_citation": "Government of Bangladesh manifests a project of 'one house one farm' (Ektee Bari Ektee Khamar) with the vision of 'poverty alleviation and sustainable development through fund mobilization and farming'",
    "country_citation": "Bangladesh accounts for a significant portion of the world's poor with nearly 26% people living below the poverty line",
    "target_population_citation": "The project will enable the rural poor and the community people with the physical and financial supports to find for their self-employment opportunities"
  }
}
```
